sourcesContent: import{createPublicClient as t,http as a}from"viem";import{getJsonRpcEndpointFromChain as e}from"../../../utils/eth/getPublicClient.mjs";import"../../../errors.mjs";import"ofetch";const n=async({chain:n,address:i,appId:s,rpcConfig:c,erc20Address:o})=>{let p=t({chain:n,transport:a(e(n,c,s))});return{balance:await p.readContract({address:o,abi:r,functionName:"balanceOf",args:[i]}).catch((()=>0n)),chain:n}};let r=[{constant:!0,inputs:[{name:"_owner",type:"address"}],name:"balanceOf",outputs:[{name:"balance",type:"uint256"}],payable:!1,stateMutability:"view",type:"function"}];export{n as getErc20Balance};
